description:
Welcome to Waves Running Simulator, the ultimate game for thrill-seekers and adrenaline junkies! In this game, your mission is to run as fast as you can to save yourself from the massive waves that threaten to swallow you whole. With every passing level, the tsunami becomes more dangerous, making your journey even more challenging.

- You'll have 50 different beaches to run on, each with its unique obstacles and terrain.  each level will offer a new and exciting experience. With 50 levels to conquer, you'll never get bored.
- As the level passes, the tsunami becomes more and more dangerous;
- You will have 50 different beaches to run, so each is very different!
- Choose 8 characters you can buy from the in game store: 4 girls & 4 boys.Choose your favorite character and take on the waves in style.

 Waves Running Simulator is the perfect game for anyone looking for an adventure. So what are you waiting for?
name: Waves Running Simulator - Surfing Hyper Runner Casual 3D Games
